about_the_game:
"Vault: Tomb of the King is Zelda but Trine, or Trine but Zelda: it's basically a big dungeon filled with puzzle spaces."
-PC Gamer Magazine

For years, adventurers have entered King Allard's tomb in search of the fabled treasure locked inside. None have been successful, until now.

  • Dynamically switch between three heroes to overcome deadly traps, enemies and puzzles.

  • Purchase new items and upgrade your abilities to improve your chance of survival.

  • Enjoy challenging hand crafted levels and puzzles that will test your wits and dexterity.

  • Experience an engaging story and uncover the truth about King Allard's Tomb.
detailed_description:
"Vault: Tomb of the King is Zelda but Trine, or Trine but Zelda: it's basically a big dungeon filled with puzzle spaces."
-PC Gamer Magazine

For years, adventurers have entered King Allard's tomb in search of the fabled treasure locked inside. None have been successful, until now.

  • Dynamically switch between three heroes to overcome deadly traps, enemies and puzzles.

  • Purchase new items and upgrade your abilities to improve your chance of survival.

  • Enjoy challenging hand crafted levels and puzzles that will test your wits and dexterity.

  • Experience an engaging story and uncover the truth about King Allard's Tomb.
legal_notice:

If you Do Not Agree to all of the terms and conditions of this EULA, click on the “CANCEL”
button which indicates that you Do Not Agree to accept the terms and conditions of this EULA
and will not complete installation of the Product.

The Owner’s Privacy Policy (the “Privacy Policy”) forms an integral part of this EULA and can be
found at . You agree to
accept and to be bound by this EULA and the Privacy Policy at any and all times. If You do not
agree with one of these do not install or use the Product.

This EULA shall coexist with, and shall not supersede, any Terms of Use of the Owner’s
websites, including but not limited to . To the extent that the
provisions of this EULA conflict with the provisions of any such Terms of Use, the conflicting

iii. Analytics Tools and Ad Serving Technology. The Owner uses third party analytics tools to

6. TERMINATION.

This EULA is effective from the earlier of the date You purchase, download, or use the Product,

7. CHANGES TO THIS EULA OR TO THE PRODUCT.

The Owner reserves the right, in its sole and absolute discretion, to revise, update, change,

The Owner may modify the Product for any reason or without any specific reason, at any time

agree that the Product may install or download the modifications automatically. You agree that

You hereby acknowledge and agree that the Owner would suffer irreparable harm if this EULA,

8. MISCELLANEOUS.

8.1 Export Controls. The Product is subject to all applicable export restrictions. You must

8.2 Severance. If any court of competent jurisdiction or competent authority finds that any

8.3 No Waiver. No failure or delay by the Owner (or its licensors) to exercise any right or

8.4 Law and Jurisdiction. (i) This EULA is governed by the laws of Canada and the province of

respective employees, subcontractors, managers, directors, officers, authorized representatives
and/or agents, vendors and content suppliers. You further accept and freely consent to the

regardless of your location, and consent to resolution of any claim or dispute by a court located

8.5 Assignment. The Owner may assign or delegate this EULA and/or the Privacy Policy and/or
Terms of Use, in whole or part, to any person or legal entity at any time with or without your

For any questions concerning this EULA, you may contact the Owner at the following address:

info@bravethevault.com.

THIS EULA IS APPLICABLE TO THE EXTENT AUTHORIZED BY LAW.
name: Vault: Tomb of the King Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP or Higher
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews:
“Vault is shaping up to be a promising game.”
PC Gamer
short_description: Vault: Tomb of the King is an action-puzzle dungeon crawler.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
